name: Aegon NV
title: Nadal sent packing at Queen's  Wawrinka and Murray win

content: LONDON Australian trailblazer Nick Kyrgios lasted just 49 minutes against Stanislas Wawrinka at Queen's Club on Tuesday before saying he wanted to forget all about tennis in the run-up to Wimbledon.
name: Aegon NV
title: Struggling Kyrgios wants to switch off

content: LONDON Defending champion Grigor Dimitrov was locked at one set all with American Sam Querrey in the first round of the Queen's club Wimbledon warm-up tournament when bad light ended play on Monday.
name: Aegon NV
title: Dimitrov fights back to level at Queen's  Hewitt out

content: LONDON Andy Murray has recovered from an illness picked up at the French Open and will begin his preparations for Wimbledon at the Aegon International at Queen's Club next week.
name: Aegon NV
title: Murray ready for Queen's despite illness

content: * Says Aegon and La Banque Postale Asset Management (LBPAM) complete asset management partnership in France
name: Aegon NV
title: BRIEF-Aegon completes asset management partnership with LBPAM

content: AMSTERDAM  May 13 Aegon  the largest Dutch insurer  said on Wednesday its underlying  pretax earnings fell 6 percent in the first quarter  missing market forecasts  due mainly to higher-than-expected claims in the United States.
name: Aegon NV
title: Dutch insurer Aegon's underlying profit misses expectations

content: * Underlying earnings before tax aegon's underlying earnings before tax in q1 of 2015 amounted to eur 469 million
name: Aegon NV
title: BRIEF-Aegon says Q1 earnings impacted by adverse claims experience

content: AMSTERDAM  Feb 19 Dutch insurer Aegon  reported better than expected fourth-quarter earnings on Thursday  boosted by investment gains as the company sold off assets in preparation for Europe's new Solvency II capital rules which come into force next year.
name: Aegon NV
title: UPDATE 1-Aegon's profits up on investment gains  strong dollar

content: AMSTERDAM  Feb 19 Dutch insurer Aegon  reported better-than-expected earnings on Thursday for the fourth quarter on a mix of growth in its businesses  the stronger U.S. dollar and investment gains.
name: Aegon NV
title: Aegon Q4 net income rises on investment gains  strong dollar

content: * In the fourth quarter of 2014  total sales were up 22 percent to eur 2.1 billion
name: Aegon NV
title: BRIEF-Aegon Q4 underlying earnings rise 19 pct
